tr.td: (StrOpt) Enable eventlet backdoor. Acceptable values are 0, <port>, and <start>:<end>, where 0 results in listening on a random tcp port number; <port> results in listening on the specified port number (and not enabling backdoor if that port is in use); and <start>:<end> results in listening on the smallest unused port number within the specified range of port numbers. The chosen port is displayed in the service's log file.
(BoolOpt) Print debugging output (set logging level to DEBUG instead of default WARNING level).
(BoolOpt) Enables or disables fatal status of deprecations.
(BoolOpt) Enables or disables publication of error events.
(StrOpt) Host to connect to for remote debugger.
(IntOpt) Port to connect to for remote debugger.
(BoolOpt) Do not monkey-patch threading system modules.
